text: The only reason I won't give the San Francisco Bay Fog Chaser a 5 star, is that once you open the sealed bag the coffee doesn't stay fresh for very long. I enjoyed the coffee, had great aroma and love that it's packaging is reduced plastic compared to original Kcups. The main thing I loved was the price! Just figure out a way to retain freshness and it's gold!San Francisco Bay Coffee One Cup for Keurig K-Cup Brewers, Fog Chaser, 36-Count
